import React from 'react' import Bg3 from '../image/4.png' function Beard() { const buttonStyle2 = "text-white text-sm bg-yellow-400 border-2 border-yellow-400 w-64 h-10 rounded-3xl my-1 hover:bg-yellow-400" const textStyle = "text-sm text-white leading-5" const headStyle = "text-yellow-400 text-5xl font-crimson" return (

GET FLAT 25% DISCOUNT!

Get Flat 25% Discount on every sunday of December. Use the promo code below.

#BARBEARDS

) } export default Beard
